definition: a saw/to cut with a saw

sentences.english: Draw anti-aliased line specified with point array and width.
sentences.chinese: 繪製指定的抗鋸齒線帶有點的數組和寬度。

sentences.english: Mitchell-Netravali: With this antialiasing filter edges will be sharp but not crisp.
sentences.chinese: 用這個抗鋸齒過濾器，物體的邊緣會銳利而不會太過。

sentences.english: All new Anti-Aliasing core engine technologies.
sentences.chinese: 全新的抗鋸齒核心引擎技術。

sentences.english: The time taken to apply anti-aliasing.
Below there are Irradiance map and Antialiasing settings.
sentences.chinese: 下面示光子貼圖和抗鋸齒的設置。

sentences.english: Current competitive systems implement anti-aliased outline fonts.
sentences.chinese: 當前競爭系統已經實現了抗鋸齒的輪廓字體。

sentences.english: We are in the process of implementing Morphological Anti-Aliasing in the graphics engine.
sentences.chinese: 我們正處在實施過程中形態抗鋸齒的圖形引擎。

sentences.english: Explains how to use antialiasing when drawing text.
sentences.chinese: 說明如何在繪製文本時使用抗鋸齒。
